channel.title: pwa on Ken Moini
channel.description: Recent content in pwa on Ken Moini

item.title: PWA-Haaat
item.description: I’m sure you’ve heard of RWD, or Responsive Web Design. HA, that’s soooo two-thousand-and-late What’s hot on the streets these days is PWA, or Progressive Web Applications. You know how Google has pretty much taken over how the web is shaped due to our consumption and reliance and development around Chrome? Yeah, well they’ve rolled out AMP which I’m sure you’ve seen, but otherwise there’s another thing - these Progressive Web Applications.
